sources.title: The Mountain (1956) Spencer Tracy Â· Robert Wagner
sources.description: The life-threatening quest of two brothers with different personalities to reach a passenger plane that crashed in the Mont Blanc region: one undertakes it out of greed, the older one out of brotherly love. An effective mountain drama, not always convincing, but still impressive thanks to Spencer Tracy's performance.

metadata.Plot: When a plane crashes on a mountaintop Chris wants to plunder the wreckage. His older brother Zachary has given up mountain guide work but goes along rather than letting his brother risk it alone. The only survivor is a Hindu girl who Chris wants to kill. Zachary fights him off. While Chris steals from the dead passengers, Zachary prepares a sled to take the girl down the mountain.
metadata.Actors: Spencer Tracy, Robert Wagner, Claire Trevor
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Award1 nomination total
